fits an average adult head k knit p purl 18 inches 46 cm in diameter unstretched kfb knit in front and back of the stitch one stitch increased 9½ inches 24 cm from edge turned up to crown k2tog - knit 2 together 26 stitches and 22 row equals 4 inches 10 cm in colorwork pattern after blocking 2 x 2 rib * k2 p2 continue from * to end of row © iknit2purl2 2016 iknit2purl2 com 2 with us size 6 4 0 mm circular needles cast on 96 begin chart b chart b is worked from right to left stitches with a stretchy cast-on i used the long tail and is then repeated eleven more times in each cast-on join in the round being careful not to row twelve repeats total switch to dpns as twist stitches place stitchmarker to mark beginning needed twelve 12 stitches remain after the final of row row of chart b begin 2 x 2 rib for 24 row break yarn leaving a 12 inch string draw through remaining stitches and pull tight weave in ends on on the next row * kfb k3 repeat from * to end of wrong side block as needed row twenty-four 24 stitches increased 120 total stitches optional if adding a pom pom make pom pom according to pom pom maker instructions and attach switch to us size 7 4 5 mm circular needles and securely to hat after blocking or attach a pre-made begin chart a chart a is worked from right to left pom pom securely to the hat after blocking colors and is then repeated seven more times in each b and d were used to make the pom pom in the round eight repeats total sample shown note carry the floats every 5-6 stitches as always if you have any questions or comments when knitting
